item.title: Aaron Nelsen | Decades of a cover-up by the Catholic Church finally end in murder conviction
item.description: An 85 year old former Priest is convicted of the 1960 murder of a former South Texas beauty queen. Rio Grande Valley Bureau reporter Aaron Nelsen shares his insight to this story, originally published on ExpressNews.com on December 9th 2017. The full story can be found here: http://www.expressnews.com/news/local/article/Decades-of-a-cover-up-by-the-Catholic-Church-12419037.php﻿
